name: Infectors [BETA] NEW MAP UPDATE!
description:
JOIN MY DISCORD TO KNOW WHEN A NEW UPDATE IS OUT!!!:
https://discord.gg/82Be77P3y7

I found it fun but idk if you will! 

Infectors What is it?
It is a human tag game with features just like Gorilla Tags but features of my own will be added like a Climbing feature!

What will the Player Models look like in future updates?
Well what I want them to look like is a human, they all will look the same but like humans with out legs.

Will their be Good updates?

I will try to make good updates!

Will you listen to the community?

Yes! I want the game to be good and fun! if the community wants a hat or a bug fix I will try my best to fix the bug or add a hat people find interesting!

Are mods/cheats allowed?

Yes and no, you see cheats are exploits and which I don't suggest to get a exploit cause they could hold a Trojan or RAT! Mods could hold the same stuff but do research on the mods and don't download the mods from YouTube unless they are trusted by the community and the code is seen safe by others!

Will this game be dead?

Maybe.
